Kashira:
Matahei (又平)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (Somemoyō imose no kadomatsu / 染模様妹背門松)

Oshun and Dembei (Chikagoro kawara no tatehiki / 近頃河原の達引)

Fishing for Wives (Tsuri onna / 釣女)

The Color Prints of Kagamiyama (Kagamiyama kokyō no nishikie / 加賀見山旧錦絵)

The Battle of Ichinotani (Ichinotani futaba gunki / 一谷嫩軍記)

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Three Oddities (Sannin katawa / 三人片輪)

The Dance of Sambaso (Kotobuki shikisanbasō / 寿式三番叟)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The Stuttering Painter (Keisei hangonkō / 傾城反魂香)

The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway (Tōkai dōchu hizakurige / 東海道中膝栗毛)

The Tycoon's Exploit (Ehon taikōki / 絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)

Kagekiyo and His Daughter (Musume Kagekiyo Yashima nikki / 嬢景清八嶋日記)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

The Story of Kasane (Meiboku kasane monogatari / 薫樹累物語)

The Dance of Sambaso (Ninin sanbasō / 二人三番叟)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

The Story of Matsukaza and Murasame (Matsukaze murasame sokutai kagami / 松風村雨束帯鑑)

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (Shinjū Yoigōshin / 心中宵庚申)

The Greengrocer's Tragedy (Yaoya no kondate / 八百屋献立)

The Ancient Calendar (Daikyōji mukashigoyomi / 大経師昔暦)

The Story of Priest Roben (Rōbensugi no yurai / 良弁杉由来)

The Monkey Dance (Utsubozaru / うつぼ猿)

The Two-Colored Reins (Koinyōbō somewake tazuna / 恋女房染分手綱)
